XXL.Chess.GameObject

Class Chessboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • XXL.Chess.GameObject.Chessboard

  • public class Chessboard
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the chessboard and manages game logic.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Chessboard

        public Chessboard(processing.core.PApplet parent,
                  java.util.HashMap<Vector2D,java.lang.Character> layout)
        Constructor for Chessboard class. Initializes the chessboard based on the provided layout.
        Parameters:
        parent - The PApplet instance that serves as the main sketch window.
        layout - HashMap representing the initial layout of chess pieces on the board.

    • Method Detail

      • getCheckedTile

        public boolean getCheckedTile()
        Checks if there is a checked tile.
        Returns:
        True if a tile is checked; false otherwise.

      • drawTiles

        public void drawTiles()
        Draws all tiles of the chessboard.

      • drawPieces

        public void drawPieces()
        Draws all chess pieces on the chessboard.

      • drawSelectedTile

        public void drawSelectedTile()
        Highlights the selected tile, previous tile, and checked tile on the chessboard.

      • drawPossibleMoves

        public void drawPossibleMoves()
        Highlights possible moves for the selected chess piece on the chessboard. Only executes if a move is not currently in progress and a valid chess piece is selected.

      • resetMousePress

        public boolean resetMousePress()
        Resets the mouse press state flag.
        Returns:
        The current state of the mouse press reset flag.

      • mousePressedReset

        public void mousePressedReset()
        Resets the mouse press state to false.

      • promoteToQueen

        public void promoteToQueen(Tile t)
        Promotes a pawn to a queen if eligible.
        Parameters:
        t - The tile containing the pawn to be promoted.

      • move

        public void move(float time,
                 float speed,
                 boolean playerTurn)
        Moves a chess piece from its origin tile to its target tile.
        Parameters:
        time - Time elapsed for the move animation.
        speed - Speed of the move animation.
        playerTurn - Indicates whether it's the player's turn.

      • setSelected

        public void setSelected(int[] coord,
                        boolean playerTurn)
        Sets the selected tile on the chessboard and calculates possible moves for the selected piece.
        Parameters:
        coord - Coordinates [x, y] of the selected tile.
        playerTurn - Indicates whether it's the player's turn.

      • resetBoard

        public void resetBoard()
        Resets the background color of all tiles on the chessboard.

      • isCheck

        public void isCheck(Tile[][] chessboard,
                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Boolean,ChessPiece> kingCoordinate,
                    boolean opponentPlayerTurn)
        Determines if the opponent's king is in check.
        Parameters:
        chessboard - The current state of the chessboard.
        kingCoordinate - Mapping of player turns to their respective kings.
        opponentPlayerTurn - Indicates whether it's the opponent's turn.

      • isChecked

        public boolean isChecked(Tile[][] chessboard,
                         java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Boolean,ChessPiece> kingCoordinate,
                         boolean opponentPlayerTurn)
        Determines if the opponent's king is in check.
        Parameters:
        chessboard - The current state of the chessboard.
        kingCoordinate - Mapping of player turns to their respective kings.
        opponentPlayerTurn - Indicates whether it's the opponent's turn.
        Returns:
        True if the opponent's king is in check; false otherwise.

      • getOpponentChessPiecesMoves

        public java.util.ArrayList<Vector2D> getOpponentChessPiecesMoves(boolean playerTurn)
        Retrieves possible moves for all opponent's chess pieces.
        Parameters:
        playerTurn - Indicates whether it's the player's turn.
        Returns:
        List of positions where opponent's chess pieces can move.

      • isStalemate

        public boolean isStalemate(boolean playerTurn)
        Checks if the game is in a stalemate situation for the given player. Stalemate occurs when the player's king is not in check but the player has no legal moves left.
        Parameters:
        playerTurn - Indicates whether it's the player's turn.
        Returns:
        True if the game is in stalemate for the player; false otherwise.
